import React,{useState} from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { REACT_APP_BASE_URL } from '../Config/Config'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import ImageHelper from '../Utils/imageHelper'; const Sidebar = () => { const location = useLocation(); const current_page = location?.pathname; const [showProfileBox, setshowProfileBox] = useState(false); const [showSubMenu, setshowSubMenu] = useState(0); const Menus = [ { Name: "Dashboard", Route: REACT_APP_BASE_URL, Icon: "fas fa-tachometer-alt", IsMenuId: 1, IsMenuActive: IsMenuActive, IsSubMenu: false, Module: "dashboard", }, ] return ( <>
<>

) } export default Sidebar;
